name: mongoose-studio
description: A modern, zero-config GUI for your Mongoose models. Run instantly with npx mongoose-studio.
author: Yasir

scripts.build: rm -rf dist ui/out && (cd ui && bun run build) && mkdir -p dist/ui && cp -r ui/out/* dist/ui/ && bun build bin/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target bun
